about_the_game:
Fleeting Summer's End is a small game of ADV. The background is set in the remote countryside of Teoswa area, China, in the middle and late August. Deng Ainyang, who was Born and grew up in the metropolis(Shenzhen), followed her parents back to her ancestral hometown, Teoswa, for regular sacrifice activities. In this countryside, Ainyang accidentally met a lovely girl, Deng Kangsui. The two girls, who grew up in different environments, developed from an accidental encounter to a more intimate relationship.

[Appreciation]
This is the second work of "YauYuenTong". Thank you very much for the support of our first work "Tinheung & Sayuri".
Even though "Tinheung & Sayuri" has many flaws, we have received much encouragement.
Thank you!

[Game features]
Yuri (Girl's love)
Teochew people may feel a sense of intimacy
With a few elements of traditional Chinese culture

[Contact us]
Weibo:柚原堂
BILIBILI:柚原堂
Twitter:柚原堂
Xiaohongshu:柚原堂
For relevant information and consultation, please also pay attention to our official account.

short_description: Fleeting Summer's End is a small game of ADV. It is in the remote countryside of Teoswa area, China, in August. Deng Ainyang, who was Born and grew up in the metropolis(Shenzhen), followed her parents back to Teoswa. In Teoswa, Ainyang met Deng Kangsui and developed an intimate relationship with her
